topic.title: How to Make Parts and Chapters Look Like Individual Publications

body.note: This topic is only applicable for the transformation scenario.
body.p: By setting the args.css.param.multifile-mode parameter, it is possible to produce individual PDF files for each part or chapter of a publication, alongside the main PDF. The extracted PDFs will preserve the styling of the original document.
body.note: Generating PDFs for each part or chapter, in addition to the main file, can create many output files. To keep the output directory clean, disable the args.keep.output.debug.files parameter.
body.p: Since each part or chapter is independent and can be read separately, the page, figure, and table counters should restart at the beginning of each chapter. You can control this behavior using the args.css.param.numbering parameter, setting its value to deep-chapter-scope.
Beyond numbering, it is possible to enforce the creation of a chapter-specific table of contents.
